test.test_name: DML Triggers must have schema prefix for table
test.query_clob:
select case when description like '%.%'
         then 'Y'
         else 'N'
         end pass_yn,
       ut.description,
       ut.trigger_name, 
       apex_string.format('Trigger `%0` needs to prefix `%2` with the schema `%3` : `%1`',
              p0 => ut.trigger_name,
							p1 => ut.description,
							p2 => ut.table_name,
							p3 => ut.table_owner) code,
			 ut.owner schema,
			 ut.table_name,
			 ut.table_owner,
       ut.object_id unqid --row-level unique id 
from v_user_triggers ut
where 1=1
test.explanation: DML trigger needs to have schema prefix because the scripts need to be runnable as system
test.fix: Add the schema prefix to the table
